A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As an absolute fanatic of the original trilogy and the original canon books\, I have to say this is by far my favorite movie since Return of the Jedi. The humor was fantastic\, the action intense\, and it pulled at every heart string imaginable and left me a blubbering mess. I've been back 3 times and plan on going a few more times before it leaves theaters. 10/10 would go again.\nAnd again.\nAnd again.
